GV05brup___u:1: sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇo vyāttam agnir vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsara ātmāśvasya medhyasya |
GV05brup___u:2_0: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaraṃ pṛthivī pājasyaṃ diśaḥ pārśve avāntaradiśaḥ parśava
GV05brup___u:2_1: ṛtavo 'ṅgāni māsāś cārdhamāsāś ca parvāṇy ahorātrāṇi pratiṣṭhā nakṣatrāṇy asthīni nabho māṃsāni |
GV05brup___u:3: ūvadhyaṃ sikatāḥ sindhavo gudā yakṛc ca klomānaś ca parvatā oṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca lomāni |
GV05brup___u:13: etau vā aśvaṃ mahimānāv abhitaḥ sambabhūvatuḥ |
GV05brup___u:14: hayo bhūtvā devān avahad vājī gandharvān arvāsurān aśvo manuṣyān |
GV05brup___u:15: samudra evāsya bandhuḥ samudro yoniḥ || BrhUp_1,1.2 ||
GV05brup___u:22: arcate vai me kam abhūd iti |
GV05brup___u:24: kaṃ ha vā asmai bhavati ya evam etad arkyasyārkatvaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,2.1 ||
GV05brup___u:26: tad yad apāṃ śara āsīt tat samahanyata |
GV05brup___u:29: tasya śrāntasya taptasya tejoraso niravartatāgniḥ || BrhUp_1,2.2 ||
GV05brup___u:30: sa tredhātmānaṃ vyakurutādityaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vāyuṃ tṛtīyam |
GV05brup___u:32: tasya prācī dik śiro 'sau cāsau cermau |
GV05brup___u:33: athāsya pratīcī dik puccham asau cāsau ca sakthyau |
GV05brup___u:35: dyauḥ pṛṣṭham antarikṣam udaram iyam uraḥ |
GV05brup___u:37: yatra kva caiti tad eva pratitiṣṭhaty evaṃ vidvān || BrhUp_1,2.3 ||
GV05brup___u:39: sa manasā vācaṃ mithunaṃ samabhavad aśanāyā mṛtyuḥ |
GV05brup___u:40: tad yad reta āsīt sa saṃvatsaro 'bhavat |
GV05brup___u:41: na ha purā tataḥ saṃvatsara āsa |
GV05brup___u:42: tam etāvantaṃ kālam abibhar yāvānt saṃvatsaraḥ |
GV05brup___u:47: sa aikṣata yadi vā imam abhimaṃsye kanīyo 'nnaṃ kariṣya iti |
GV05brup___u:48: sa tayā vācā tenātmanedaṃ sarvam asṛjata yad idaṃ kiñca -- ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni chandāṃsi yajñān prajāṃ paśūn |
GV05brup___u:49: sa yad-yad evāsṛjata tattad attum adhriyata |
GV05brup___u:50: sarvaṃ vā attīti tad aditer adititvam |
GV05brup___u:51: sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evam etad aditer adititvaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,2.5 ||
GV05brup___u:55: tasya śrāntasya taptasya yaśo vīryam udakrāmat |
GV05brup___u:58: tasya śarīra eva mana āsīt || BrhUp_1,2.6 ||
GV05brup___u:59: so 'kāmayata -- medhyaṃ ma idaṃ syād ātmanvy anena syām iti |
GV05brup___u:61: yad aśvat tan medhyam abhūd iti tad evāśvamedhasyāśvamedhatvam |
GV05brup___u:62: eṣa ha vā aśvamedhaṃ veda ya enam evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:67: eṣa vā aśvamedho ya eṣa tapati |
GV05brup___u:72: so punar ekaiva devatā bhavati mṛtyur eva |
GV05brup___u:78: dvayā ha prājāpatyā devāś cāsurāś ca tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāḥ |
GV05brup___u:80: te ha devā ūcur hantāsurān yajña udgīthenātyayāmeti || BrhUp_1,3.1 ||
GV05brup___u:81: te ha vācam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:83: yo vāci bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:87: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ vadati |
GV05brup___u:89: atha ha prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:91: yaḥ prāṇe bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:95: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ jighrati |
GV05brup___u:97: atha ha cakṣur ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:99: yaś cakṣuṣi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:103: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ paśyati |
GV05brup___u:105: atha ha śrotram ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:107: yaḥ śrotre bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:114: atha ha mana ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:116: yo manasi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brup___u:123: evam u khalv etā devatāḥ pāpmabhir upāsṛjan |
GV05brup___u:125: atha hemam āsanyaṃ prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brup___u:129: sa yathāśmānam ṛtvā loṣṭo vidhvaṃsetaivaṃ haiva vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco vineśuḥ |
GV05brup___u:131: bhavaty ātmanā, parāsya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.7 ||
GV05brup___u:132: te hocuḥ -- kva nu so 'bhūd yo na ittham asakteti |
GV05brup___u:135: sā vā eṣā devatā dūr nāma |
GV05brup___u:137: dūraṃ ha vā asmān mṛtyur bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.9 ||
GV05brup___u:138: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatya yatrāsāṃ diśām antas tad gamayāṃ cakāra |
GV05brup___u:140: tasmān na janam iyān nāntam iyān net pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum anvavāyānīti || BrhUp_1,3.10 ||
GV05brup___u:141: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatyāthainā mṛtyum atyavahat || BrhUp_1,3.11 ||
GV05brup___u:142: sā vai vācam eva prathamām atyavahat |
GV05brup___u:143: sā yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata so 'gnir abhavat |
GV05brup___u:144: so 'yam agniḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto dīpyate || BrhUp_1,3.12 ||
GV05brup___u:146: sa yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa vāyur abhavat |
GV05brup___u:147: so 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntaḥ pavate || BrhUp_1,3.13 ||
GV05brup___u:149: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa ādityo 'bhavat |
GV05brup___u:150: so 'sāv ādityaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntas tapati || BrhUp_1,3.14 ||
GV05brup___u:152: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata tā diśo 'bhavan |
GV05brup___u:153: tā imā diśaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntāḥ || BrhUp_1,3.15 ||
GV05brup___u:155: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa candramā abhavat |
GV05brup___u:156: so 'sau candraḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto bhāti |
GV05brup___u:157: evaṃ ha vā enam eṣā devatā mṛtyum ativahati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.16 ||
GV05brup___u:159: yad dhi kiñcānnam adyate 'nenaiva tad adyate |
GV05brup___u:162: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad annam |
GV05brup___u:167: tasmād yad anenānnam atti tenaitās tṛpyanti |
GV05brup___u:168: evaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisaṃviśanti bhartā svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavaty annādo 'dhipatir ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:169: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratir bubhūṣati na haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati |
GV05brup___u:170: atha ya evaitam anubhavati yo vaitam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati || BrhUp_1,3.18 ||
GV05brup___u:174: tasmād yasmāt kasmāccāṅgāt prāṇa utkrāmati tad eva tac chuṣyati |
GV05brup___u:175: eṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ || BrhUp_1,3.19 ||
GV05brup___u:178: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u bṛhaspatiḥ || BrhUp_1,3.20 ||
GV05brup___u:181: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u brahmaṇaspatiḥ || BrhUp_1,3.21 ||
GV05brup___u:183: vāg vai sāmaiṣa sā cāmaś ceti tat sāmnaḥ sāmatvam |
GV05brup___u:184: yad v eva samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhis tribhir lokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa tasmād v eva sāma |
GV05brup___u:186: ya evam etat sāma veda || BrhUp_1,3.22 ||
GV05brup___u:188: prāṇo vā ut prāṇena hīdaṃ sarvam uttabdham |
GV05brup___u:192: tad dhāpi brahmadattaś caikitāneyo rājānaṃ bhakṣayann uvāca |
GV05brup___u:193: ayaṃ tyasya rājā mūrdhānaṃ vipātayatād yad ito 'yāsya āṅgiraso 'nyenodagāyad iti |
GV05brup___u:194: vācā ca hy eva sa prāṇena codagāyad iti || BrhUp_1,3.24 ||
GV05brup___u:195: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ svaṃ veda bhavati hāsya svam |
GV05brup___u:197: tasmād ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyan vāci svaram iccheta |
GV05brup___u:201: bhavati hāsya svaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ svaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.25 ||
GV05brup___u:202: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda bhavati hāsya suvarṇam |
GV05brup___u:204: bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ ya evam etat sāmnaḥ suvarṇaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.26 ||
GV05brup___u:205: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhati |
GV05brup___u:207: vāci hi khalv eṣa etat prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhito gīyate |
GV05brup___u:208: anna ity u haika āhuḥ || BrhUp_1,3.27 ||
GV05brup___u:210: sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti |
GV05brup___u:211: sa yatra prastuyāt tad etāni japet |
GV05brup___u:212: asato mā sad gamaya, tamaso mā jyotir gamaya, mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayeti |
GV05brup___u:213: sa yad āhāsato mā sad gamayeti |
GV05brup___u:214: mṛtyur vā asat sad amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha |
GV05brup___u:216: mṛtyur vai tamo jyotir amṛtaṃ mṛtyor māmṛtaṃ gamayāmṛtaṃ mā kurv ity evaitad āha |
GV05brup___u:219: atha yānītarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣv ātmane 'nnādyam āgāyet |
GV05brup___u:222: sa eṣa evaṃvid udgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam āgāyati |
GV05brup___u:224: na haivālokyatāyā āśāsti ya evam etat sāma veda || BrhUp_1,3.28 ||
GV05brup___u:229: tasmād apy etarhy āmantrito 'ham ayam ity evāgra uktvāthānyan nāma prabrūte yad asya bhavati |
GV05brup___u:230: sa yat pūrvo 'smāt sarvasmāt sarvān pāpmana auṣat tasmāt puruṣaḥ |
GV05brup___u:231: oṣati ha vai sa taṃ yo 'smāt pūrvo bubhūṣati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.1 ||
GV05brup___u:233: sa hāyam īkṣāṃ cakre, yan mad anyan nāsti kasmān nu bibhemīti |
GV05brup___u:240: sa haitāvān āsa yathā strīpumāṃsau sampariṣvaktau |
GV05brup___u:243: tasmād idam ardhabṛgalam iva sva iti ha smāha yājñavalkyaḥ |
GV05brup___u:244: tasmād ayam ākāśaḥ striyā pūryata eva |
GV05brup___u:247: so heyam īkṣāṃ cakre -- kathaṃ nu mātmana eva janayitvā sambhavati |
GV05brup___u:260: evam eva yad idaṃ kiñca mithunam ā pipīlikābhyas tat sarvam asṛjata || BrhUp_1,4.4 ||
GV05brup___u:261: so 'ved ahaṃ vāva sṛṣṭir asmy ahaṃ hīdaṃ sarvam asṛkṣīti |
GV05brup___u:263: sṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.5 ||
GV05brup___u:265: sa mukhāc ca yoner hastābhyāṃ cāgnim asṛjata |
GV05brup___u:268: tad yad idam āhur amuṃ yajāmuṃ yajety ekaikaṃ devam etasyaiva sā visṛṣṭiḥ |
GV05brup___u:269: eṣa u hy eva sarve devāḥ |
GV05brup___u:270: atha yat kiñcedam ārdraṃ tad retaso 'sṛjata |
GV05brup___u:272: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvam annaṃ caivānnādaś ca |
GV05brup___u:275: yac chreyaso devān asṛjatātha yan martyaḥ sann amṛtān asṛjata tasmād atisṛṣṭir |
GV05brup___u:276: atisṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.6 ||
GV05brup___u:278: tan nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyatāsau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti |
GV05brup___u:279: tad idam apy etarhi nāmarūpābhyām eva vyākriyata asau nāmāyam idaṃrūpa iti |
GV05brup___u:280: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ā nakhāgrebhyo yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne 'vahitaḥ syād viśvambharo vā viśvambharakulāye |
GV05brup___u:282: akṛtsno hi saḥ prāṇann eva prāṇo nāma bhavati |
GV05brup___u:283: vadan vāk paśyaṃś cakṣuḥ śṛṇvañ chrotraṃ manvāno manaḥ |
GV05brup___u:285: sa yo 'ta ekaikam upāste na sa veda |
GV05brup___u:288: atra hy ete sarva ekaṃ bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:289: tad etat padanīyam asya sarvasya yad ayam ātmā |
GV05brup___u:291: yathā ha vai padenānuvinded evaṃ kīrtiṃ ślokaṃ vindate ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.7 ||
GV05brup___u:292: tad etat preyaḥ putrāt preyo vittāt preyo 'nyasmāt sarvasmād antarataraṃ yad ayam ātmā |
GV05brup___u:293: sa yo 'nyam ātmanaḥ priyaṃ bruvāṇaṃ brūyāt priyaṃ rotsyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva syāt |
GV05brup___u:295: sa ya ātmānam eva priyam upāste na hāsya priyaṃ pramāyukaṃ bhavati || BrhUp_1,4.8 ||
GV05brup___u:296: tad āhur yad brahmavidyayā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyanto manuṣyā manyante |
GV05brup___u:297: kim u tad brahmāved yasmāt tat sarvam abhavad iti || BrhUp_1,4.9 ||
GV05brup___u:302: tad yo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat |
GV05brup___u:305: tad dhaitat paśyann ṛṣir vāmadevaḥ pratipede 'haṃ manur abhavaṃ sūryaś ceti |
GV05brup___u:306: tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:307: tasya ha na devāś canābhūtyā īśate |
GV05brup___u:309: atha yo 'nyāṃ devatām upāste 'nyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda |
GV05brup___u:311: yathā ha vai bahavaḥ paśavo manuṣyaṃ bhuñjyur evam ekaikaḥ puruṣo devān bhunakti |
GV05brup___u:312: ekasminn eva paśāv ādīyamāne 'priyaṃ bhavati kim u bahuṣu |
GV05brup___u:313: tasmād eṣāṃ tan na priyaṃ yad etan manuṣyā vidyuḥ || BrhUp_1,4.10 ||
GV05brup___u:314: brahma vā idam agra āsīd ekam eva |
GV05brup___u:317: yāny etāni devatrā kṣatrāṇīndro varuṇaḥ somo rudraḥ parjanyo yamo mṛtyur īśāna iti |
GV05brup___u:319: tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaṃ adhastād upāste rājasūye |
GV05brup___u:322: tasmād yady api rājā paramatāṃ gacchati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yonim |
GV05brup___u:323: ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ sa yonim ṛcchati |
GV05brup___u:324: sa pāpīyān bhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā || BrhUp_1,4.11 ||
GV05brup___u:327: yāny etāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti || BrhUp_1,4.12 ||
GV05brup___u:331: iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yad idaṃ kiñca || BrhUp_1,4.13 ||
GV05brup___u:334: tad etat kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ yad dharmaḥ |
GV05brup___u:338: yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyaṃ vai tat |
GV05brup___u:339: tasmāt satyaṃ vadantam āhur dharmaṃ vadatīti |
GV05brup___u:341: etad dhy evaitad ubhayaṃ bhavati || BrhUp_1,4.14 ||
GV05brup___u:342: tad etad brahma kṣatraṃ viṭ śūdraḥ |
GV05brup___u:343: tad agninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavad brāhmaṇo manuṣyeṣu,
GV05brup___u:346: tasmād agnāv eva deveṣu lokam icchante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣu |
GV05brup___u:348: atha yo ha vā asmāl lokāt svaṃ lokam adṛṣṭvā praiti sa enam avidito na bhunakti yathā vedo vānanūkto 'nyad vā karmākṛtam |
GV05brup___u:349: yadi ha vā apy anevaṃvin mahatpuṇyaṃ karma karoti tad dhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata eva |
GV05brup___u:351: sa ya ātmānam eva lokam upāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate |
GV05brup___u:352: asmād dhy evātmano yadyat kāmayate tattat sṛjate || BrhUp_1,4.15 ||
GV05brup___u:353: atho ayaṃ vā ātmā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brup___u:354: sa yaj juhoti yad yajate tena devānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brup___u:356: atha yat pitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti yat prajām icchate tena pitṝṇām |
GV05brup___u:357: atha yan manuṣyān vāsayate yad ebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām |
GV05brup___u:358: atha yat paśubhyas tṛṇodakaṃ vindati tena paśūnām |
GV05brup___u:359: yad asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsy ā pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brup___u:360: yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭim icchet |
GV05brup___u:361: evaṃ haivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāny ariṣṭim icchanti |
GV05brup___u:362: tad vā etad viditaṃ mīmāṃsitam || BrhUp_1,4.16 ||
GV05brup___u:364: so 'kāmayata jāyā me syād atha prajāyeya |
GV05brup___u:365: atha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti |
GV05brup___u:368: tasmād apy etarhy ekākī kāmayate -- jāyā me syād atha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti |
GV05brup___u:369: sa yāvad apy eteṣām ekaikaṃ na prāpnoty akṛtsna eva tāvan manyate |
GV05brup___u:383: pāṅktam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiñca |
GV05brup___u:384: tad idaṃ sarvam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.17 ||
GV05brup___u:386: ekam asya sādhāraṇaṃ dve devān abhājayat |
GV05brup___u:388: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na |
GV05brup___u:389: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadā |
GV05brup___u:390: yo vai tām akṣitiṃ veda so 'nnam atti pratīkena |
GV05brup___u:391: sa devān apigacchati sa ūṛjam upajīvati |
GV05brup___u:394: medhayā hi tapasājanayat pitaikam asya sādhāraṇam iti |
GV05brup___u:395: idam evāsya tat sādhāraṇam annaṃ yad idam adyate |
GV05brup___u:396: sa ya etad upāste na sa pāpmano vyāvartate |
GV05brup___u:400: tasmād devebhyo juhvati ca pra ca juhvati |
GV05brup___u:405: payo hy evāgre manuṣyāś ca paśavaś copajīvanti |
GV05brup___u:406: tasmāt kumāraṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vaivāgre pratilehayanti stanaṃ vānudhāpayanti |
GV05brup___u:407: atha vatsaṃ jātam āhus tṛṇād iti |
GV05brup___u:408: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti |
GV05brup___u:409: payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na |
GV05brup___u:410: tad yad idam āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ payasā juhvad apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti |
GV05brup___u:412: yad ahar eva juhoti tad ahaḥ punarmṛtyum apajayaty evaṃ vidvān |
GV05brup___u:414: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadeti |
GV05brup___u:416: sa hīdam annaṃ punaḥ punar janayate |
GV05brup___u:419: sa hīdam annaṃ dhiyādhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ |
GV05brup___u:420: yad dhaitan na kuryāt kṣīyeta ha |
GV05brup___u:423: sa devān apigacchati sa ūrjam upajīvatīti praśaṃsā || BrhUp_1,5.2 ||
GV05brup___u:426: anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nādarśam anyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam iti manasā hy eva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti |
GV05brup___u:427: kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva |
GV05brup___u:428: tasmād api pṛṣṭhata upaspṛṣṭo manasā vijānāti |
GV05brup___u:429: yaḥ kaśca śabdo vāg eva sā |
GV05brup___u:430: eṣā hy antaṃ āyattaiṣā hi na |
GV05brup___u:431: prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samāno 'na ity etat sarvaṃ prāṇa eva |
GV05brup___u:435: vāg evāyaṃ loko mano 'ntarikṣalokaḥ prāṇo 'sau lokaḥ || BrhUp_1,5.4 ||
GV05brup___u:437: vāg evargvedo mano yajurvedaḥ prāṇaḥ sāmavedaḥ || BrhUp_1,5.5 ||
GV05brup___u:439: vāg eva devā manaḥ pitaraḥ, prāṇo mānuṣyāḥ || BrhUp_1,5.6 ||
GV05brup___u:441: mana eva pitā vāṅ mātā prāṇaḥ prajā || BrhUp_1,5.7 ||
GV05brup___u:443: yat kiñca vijñātaṃ vācas tad rūpam |
GV05brup___u:446: yat kiñca vijijñāsyaṃ manasas tad rūpam |
GV05brup___u:454: tad yāvaty eva vāk tāvatī pṛthivī tāvān ayam agniḥ || BrhUp_1,5.11 ||
GV05brup___u:457: tad yāvad eva manas tāvatī dyaus tāvān asāv ādityaḥ |
GV05brup___u:463: nāsya sapatno bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,5.12 ||
GV05brup___u:466: tad yāvān eva prāṇas tāvatya āpas tāvān asau candraḥ |
GV05brup___u:467: ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ |
GV05brup___u:468: sa yo haitān antavata upāste 'ntavantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati |
GV05brup___u:469: atha yo haitān anantān upāste 'nantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati || BrhUp_1,5.13 ||
GV05brup___u:473: sa rātribhir evā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate |
GV05brup___u:474: so 'māvāsyāṃ rātrim etayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvam idaṃ prāṇabhṛd anupraviśya tataḥ prātar jāyate |
GV05brup___u:475: tasmād etāṃ rātriṃ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicchindyād api kṛkalāsasyaitasyā eva devatāyā apacityai || BrhUp_1,5.14 ||
GV05brup___u:476: yo vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakālo 'yam eva sa yo 'yam evaṃvit puruṣaḥ |
GV05brup___u:479: sa vittenaivā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate |
GV05brup___u:480: tad etan nabhyaṃ yad ayam ātmā |
GV05brup___u:482: tasmād yady api sarvajyāniṃ jīyata ātmanā cej jīvati pradhināgād ity evāhuḥ || BrhUp_1,5.15 ||
GV05brup___u:483: atha trayo vāva lokā manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti |
GV05brup___u:484: so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā |
GV05brup___u:490: yadā praiṣyan manyate 'tha putram āha -- tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ loka iti |
GV05brup___u:491: sa putraḥ pratyāhāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'ham loka iti |
GV05brup___u:492: yad vai kiñcānūktaṃ tasya sarvasya brahmety ekatā |
GV05brup___u:493: ye vai ke ca yajñās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ity ekatā |
GV05brup___u:494: ye vai ke ca lokās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ity ekatā |
GV05brup___u:496: etan mā sarvaṃ sann ayam ito bhunajad iti |
GV05brup___u:499: sa yadaivaṃvid asmāl lokāt praity athaibhir eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati |
GV05brup___u:500: sa yady anena kiñcid akṣṇayā kṛtaṃ bhavati tasmād enaṃ sarvasmāt putro muñcati tasmāt putro nāma |
GV05brup___u:502: athainam ete devāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti || BrhUp_1,5.17 ||
GV05brup___u:503: pṛthivyai cainam agneś ca daivī vāg āviśati |
GV05brup___u:504: sā vai daivī vāg yayā yad yad eva vadati tat tad bhavati || BrhUp_1,5.18 ||
GV05brup___u:505: divaś cainam ādityāc ca daivaṃ mana āviśati |
GV05brup___u:506: tad vai daivaṃ mano yenānandy eva bhavaty atho na śocati || BrhUp_1,5.19 ||
GV05brup___u:507: adbhyaś cainaṃ candramasaś ca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati |
GV05brup___u:508: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati |
GV05brup___u:509: sa eṣa evaṃvit sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā bhavati |
GV05brup___u:511: yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanty evaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanti |
GV05brup___u:512: yad u kiñcemāḥ prajāḥ śocanty amaivāsāṃ tad bhavati |
GV05brup___u:514: na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati || BrhUp_1,5.20 ||
GV05brup___u:528: athemam eva nāpnot yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ |
GV05brup___u:530: ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati |
GV05brup___u:534: tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:536: anuśuṣya haivāntato mriyata ity adhyātmam || BrhUp_1,5.21 ||
GV05brup___u:542: sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evam etāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ |
GV05brup___u:543: mlocanti hy anyā devatā na vāyuḥ |
GV05brup___u:546: yataś codeti sūryo 'staṃ yatra ca gacchatīti |
GV05brup___u:547: prāṇād vā eṣa udeti prāṇe 'stam eti |
GV05brup___u:548: taṃ devāś cakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti |
GV05brup___u:549: yad vā ete 'murhy adhriyanta tad evāpy adya kurvanti |
GV05brup___u:550: tasmād ekam eva vrataṃ caret prāṇyāc caivāpānyāc ca |
GV05brup___u:551: nen mā pāpmā mṛtyur āpnavad iti |
GV05brup___u:552: yady u caret samāpipayiṣet teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati || BrhUp_1,5.23 ||
GV05brup___u:553: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma |
GV05brup___u:554: teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāg ity etad eṣām uktham |
GV05brup___u:559: etad dhi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti || BrhUp_1,6.1 ||
GV05brup___u:560: atha rūpāṇāṃ cakṣur ity etad eṣām uktham |
GV05brup___u:565: etad dhi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti || BrhUp_1,6.2 ||
GV05brup___u:566: atha karmaṇām ātmety etad eṣām uktham |
GV05brup___u:572: tad etat trayaṃ sad ekam ayam ātmā |
GV05brup___u:579: sa hovācājātaśatruṃ kāśyaṃ -- brahma te bravāṇīti |
GV05brup___u:580: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- sahasram etasyāṃ vāci dadmaḥ,
GV05brup___u:581: janako janaka iti vai janā dhāvantīti || BrhUp_2,1.1 ||
GV05brup___u:582: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsāv āditye puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:584: atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrdhā rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:585: sa ya etam evam upāste 'tiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrdhā rājā bhavati || BrhUp_2,1.2 ||
GV05brup___u:586: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau candre puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:588: bṛhan pāṇdaravāsāḥ somo rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:589: sa ya etam evam upāste 'har-ahar sutaḥ prasuto bhavati |
GV05brup___u:591: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāsau vidyuti puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:593: tejasvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:594: sa ya etam evam upāste tejasvī ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:596: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ākāśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:598: pūrṇam apravartīti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:599: sa ya etam evam upāste pūryate prajayā paśubhir nāsyāsmāl lokāt prajodvartate || BrhUp_2,1.5 ||
GV05brup___u:600: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ vāyau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:602: indro vaikuṇṭho 'parājitā seneti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:603: sa ya etam evam upāste jiṣṇur hāparājiṣṇur bhavaty anyatastyajāyī || BrhUp_2,1.6 ||
GV05brup___u:604: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam agnau puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:606: viṣāsahir iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:607: sa ya etam evam upāste viṣāsahir ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:609: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam apsu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:611: pratirūpa iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:612: sa ya etam evam upāste pratirūpaṃ haivainam upagacchati nāpratirūpam |
GV05brup___u:614: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ādarśe puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:616: rociṣṇur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:617: sa ya etam evam upāste rociṣṇur ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:621: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ yantaṃ paścāc chabbo 'nūdety etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:623: asur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:624: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti |
GV05brup___u:625: nainaṃ purā kālāt prāṇo jahāti || BrhUp_2,1.10 ||
GV05brup___u:626: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ dikṣu puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:628: dvitīyo 'napaga iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:629: sa ya etam evam upāste dvitīyavān ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:631: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyaṃ chāyāmayaḥ puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:633: mṛtyur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:634: sa ya etam evam upāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃl loka āyur eti |
GV05brup___u:635: nainaṃ purā kālān mṛtyur āgacchati || BrhUp_2,1.12 ||
GV05brup___u:636: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- ya evāyam ātmani puruṣa etam evāhaṃ brahmopāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:638: ātmanvīti vā aham etam upāsa iti |
GV05brup___u:639: sa ya etam evam upāsta ātmanvī ha bhavati |
GV05brup___u:641: sa ha tūṣṇīm āsa gārgyaḥ || BrhUp_2,1.13 ||
GV05brup___u:645: sa hovāca gārgyaḥ -- upa tvāyānīti || BrhUp_2,1.14 ||
GV05brup___u:646: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- pratilomaṃ caitad yad brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyam upeyād brahma me vakṣyatīti |
GV05brup___u:650: tam etair nāmabhir āmantrayāṃ cakre bṛhan pāṇdaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti |
GV05brup___u:654: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūt kuta etad āgād iti |
GV05brup___u:655: tad u ha na mene gārgyaḥ || BrhUp_2,1.16 ||
GV05brup___u:656: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ -- yatraiṣa etat supto 'bhūd ya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣas tad eṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijnānam ādāya ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaya ākāśas tasmiñ chete |
GV05brup___u:664: sa yatraitat svapnyayā carati te hāsya lokāḥ |
GV05brup___u:665: tad uteva mahārājo bhavaty uteva mahābrāhmaṇaḥ |
GV05brup___u:667: sa yathā mahārājo jānapadān gṛhītvā sve janapade yathākāmaṃ parivartetaivam evaiṣa etat prāṇān gṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate || BrhUp_2,1.18 ||
GV05brup___u:670: hitā nāma nādyo dvāsaptatiḥ sahasrāṇi hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratiṣṭhante |
GV05brup___u:672: sa yathā kumāro add. vā mahārājo vā mahābrāhmaṇo vātighnīm ānandasya gatvā śayīta |
GV05brup___u:674: sa yathorṇavābhis tantunoccared yathā agneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranty evam evāsmād ātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti |
GV05brup___u:676: prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eṣa satyam || BrhUp_2,1.20 ||
GV05brup___u:677: yo ha vai śiśuṃ sādhānaṃ sapratyādhānaṃ sasthūṇaṃ sadāmaṃ veda sapta ha dviṣato bhrātṛvyān avaruṇaddhi |
GV05brup___u:678: ayaṃ vāva śiśur yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ |
GV05brup___u:679: tasyedam evādhānam idaṃ pratyādhānaṃ prāṇaḥ sthūṇānnaṃ dāma || BrhUp_2,2.1 ||
GV05brup___u:681: tad yā imā akṣaṃl lohinyo rājayas tābhir enaṃ rudro 'nvāyattaḥ |
GV05brup___u:682: atha yā akṣann āpas tābhiḥ parjanyaḥ |
GV05brup___u:688: nāsyānnaṃ kṣīyate ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_2,2.2 ||
GV05brup___u:690: arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnas tasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam |
GV05brup___u:691: tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīre vāg aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti |
GV05brup___u:693: idaṃ tac charīra eṣa hy arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ |
GV05brup___u:701: vāg ghy aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvitte || BrhUp_2,2.3 ||
GV05brup___u:710: attir ha vai nāmaitad yad autrir iti |
GV05brup___u:712: sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_2,2.4 ||
GV05brup___u:718: tad etan mūrtaṃ yad anyad vāyoś cāntarikṣāc ca |
GV05brup___u:722: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso ya eṣa tapati |
GV05brup___u:729: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣaḥ |
GV05brup___u:733: idam eva mūrtaṃ yad anyat prāṇāc ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ |
GV05brup___u:737: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yac cakṣuḥ |
GV05brup___u:739: athāmūrtaṃ prāṇaś ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ |
GV05brup___u:743: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣan puruṣaḥ |
GV05brup___u:746: yathā māhārajanaṃ vāso yathā pāṇḍvāvikaṃ yathendragopo yathāgnyarcir yathā puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā sakṛdvidyuttam |
GV05brup___u:747: sakṛdvidyutteva ha vā asya śrīr bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brup___u:749: na hy etasmād iti nety anyat param asti |
GV05brup___u:753: maitreyīti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- udyāsyan vā are 'ham asmāt sthānād asmi |
GV05brup___u:755: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yan nu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthivī vittena pūrṇā syāt kathaṃ tenāmṛtā syām iti |
GV05brup___u:757: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syāt |
GV05brup___u:759: sā hovāca maitreyī -- yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kim ahaṃ tena kuryām |
GV05brup___u:760: yad eva bhagavān veda tad eva me brūhīti || BrhUp_2,4.3 ||
GV05brup___u:761: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- priyā batāre naḥ satī priyaṃ bhāṣase |
GV05brup___u:765: sa hovāca -- na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati |
GV05brup___u:766: na vā are jāyāyai kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya jāyā priyā bhavati |
GV05brup___u:767: na vā are putrāṇāṃ kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:768: na vā are vittasya kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya vittaṃ priyaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:769: na vā are brahmaṇaḥ kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya brahma priyaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:770: na vā are kṣatrasya kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya kṣatraṃ priyaṃ bhavati |
GV05brup___u:771: na vā are lokānāṃ kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya lokāḥ priyā bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:772: na vā are devānāṃ kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya devāḥ priyā bhavanti |
GV05brup___u:773: na vā are bhūtānāṃ kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya bhūtāni priyāṇi bhavanti |

GV05brup___u:2532: etam u haiva jānakir āyasthūṇaḥ satyakāmāya jābālāyāntevāsina uktvovāca -- api ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti || BrhUp_6,3.11 ||
GV05brup___u:2533: etam u haiva satyakāmo jābālo 'ntevāsibhya uktvova -- acāpi ya enaṃ śuṣke sthāṇau niṣiñcej jāyerañ chākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśānīti |
GV05brup___u:2534: tam etaṃ nāputrāya vānantevāsine vā brūyāt || BrhUp_6,3.12 ||
GV05brup___u:2536: audumbaraḥ sruva audumbaraś camasa audumbara idhma audumbaryā upamanthanyau |
GV05brup___u:2538: vrīhiyavās tilamāṣā aṇupriyaṃgavo godhūmāś ca masūrāś ca khalvāś ca khalakulāś ca |
GV05brup___u:2539: tān piṣṭān dadhani madhuni ghṛta upasiñcati |
GV05brup___u:2548: sa ha prajāpatir īkṣāṃ cakre -- hantāsmai pratiṣṭhāṃ kalpayānīti sa striyaṃ sasṛje |
GV05brup___u:2551: sa etaṃ prāñcaṃ grāvāṇam ātmana eva samudapārayat |
GV05brup___u:2557: sa yāvān ha vai vājapeyena yajamanasya loko bhavati tāvān asya loko bhavati |
GV05brup___u:2558: ya evaṃ vidvān adhopahāsaṃ caraty āsāṃ strīṇāṃ sukṛtaṃ vṛṅkte |
GV05brup___u:2559: atha ya idam avidvān adhopahāsaṃ caraty āsya striyaḥ sukṛtaṃ vṛñjate || BrhUp_6,4.3 ||
GV05brup___u:2560: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān uddālaka ārunir āha |
GV05brup___u:2561: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān nāko maudgalya āha |
GV05brup___u:2562: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān kumārahārita āha -- bahavo maryā brāhmanāyanā nirindriyā visukṛto 'smāl lokāt prayanti ya idam avidvāṃso 'dhopahāsaṃ carantīti |
GV05brup___u:2563: bahu vā idaṃ suptasya vā jāgrato vā retaḥ skandati || BrhUp_6,4.4 ||
GV05brup___u:2564: tad abhimṛśed anu vā mantrayeta -- yan me 'dya retaḥ pṛthivīm askāntsīd yad oṣadhīr apy asarad yad apaḥ |
GV05brup___u:2566: punar mām aitu indriyaṃ punas tejaḥ punar bhagaḥ |
GV05brup___u:2568: ity anāmikāṅguṣṭhābhyām ādāyāntareṇa stanau vā bhruvau vā nimṛjyāt || BrhUp_6,4.5 ||
GV05brup___u:2569: atha yady udaka ātmānaṃ paśyet tad abhimantrayeta -- mayi teja indriyaṃ yaśo draviṇaṃ sukṛtam iti |
GV05brup___u:2570: śrīr ha vā eṣā strīṇāṃ yan malodvāsāḥ |
GV05brup___u:2572: sā ced asmai na dadyāt kāmam enām avakriṇīyāt |
GV05brup___u:2573: sā ced asmai naiva dadyāt kāmam enāṃ yaṣṭyā vā pāṇinā vopahatyātikrāmet |
GV05brup___u:2574: indriyena te yaśasā yaśa ādada iti |
GV05brup___u:2576: sā ced asmai dadyād indriyeṇa te yaśasā yaśa ādadhāmīti |
GV05brup___u:2578: sa yām icchet -- kāmayeta meti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyopastham asyā abhimṛśya japet --
GV05brup___u:2580: sa tvam aṅgakaṣāyo 'si digdhaviddhām iva mādayemām amūṃ mayīti || BrhUp_6,4.9 ||
GV05brup___u:2581: atha yām icchen na garbhaṃ dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyābhiprāṇyāpānyāt |
GV05brup___u:2582: indriyeṇa te retasā reta ādada iti |
GV05brup___u:2584: atha yām icched dadhīteti tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāyāpānyābhiprāṇyāt |
GV05brup___u:2587: atha yasya jāyāyai jāraḥ syāt taṃ ced dviṣyād āmapātre 'gnim upasamādhāya pratilomaṃ śarabarhiḥ stīrtvā tasminn etāḥ śarabhṛṣṭīḥ pratilomāḥ sarpiṣāktā juhuyāt |
GV05brup___u:2596: sa vā eṣa nirindriyo visukṛto 'smāl lokād praiti yam evaṃvid brāhmaṇaḥ śapati |
GV05brup___u:2598: uta hy evaṃvit paro bhavati || BrhUp_6,4.12 ||
GV05brup___u:2599: atha yasya jāyām ārtavaṃ vindet tryahaṃ kaṃse na pibet |
GV05brup___u:2603: sa ya icchet -- putro me śuklo jāyeta vedam anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti kṣīraudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2605: atha ya icchet -- putro me kapilaḥ piṅgalo jāyeta dvau vedāv anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti dadhyodanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2607: atha ya icchet -- putro me śyāmo lohitākṣo jāyeta trīn vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti udaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2609: atha ya icched -- duhitā me paṇḍitā jāyeta sarvam āyur iyād iti tilaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2611: atha ya icchet -- putro me paṇḍito vigītaḥ samitiṃgamaḥ śuśrūṣitāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣitā jāyeta sarvān vedān anubruvīta sarvam āyur iyād iti māṃsaudanaṃ pācayitvā sarpiṣmantam aśnīyātām |
GV05brup___u:2614: athābhiprātar eva sthālīpākāvṛtājyaṃ ceṣṭitvā sthālīpākasyopaghātaṃ juhoty agnaye svāhānumataye svāhā devāya savitre satyaprasavāya svāheti |
GV05brup___u:2617: prakṣālya pāṇī udapātraṃ pūrayitvā tenaināṃ trir abhyukṣati --
GV05brup___u:2620: athainām abhipadyate -- amo 'ham asmi sā tvam |
GV05brup___u:2624: tāv ehi saṃrabhāvahai saha reto dadhāvahai |
GV05brup___u:2626: athāsyā ūrū vihāpayati -- vijihīthāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī iti |
GV05brup___u:2627: tasyām arthaṃ niṣṭhāya mukhena mukhaṃ saṃdhāya trir enām anulomām anumārṣṭi --
GV05brup___u:2628: viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu |
GV05brup___u:2629: ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te |
GV05brup___u:2630: garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi pṛthuṣṭuke |
GV05brup___u:2631: garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv ādhattāṃ puṣkarasrajau || BrhUp_6,4.21 ||
GV05brup___u:2633: taṃ te garbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtaye |
GV05brup___u:2634: yathāgnigarbhā pṛthivī yathā dyaur aindreṇa garbhiṇī |
GV05brup___u:2635: vāyur diśāṃ yathā garbha evaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi te 'sāv iti || BrhUp_6,4.22 ||
GV05brup___u:2638: evā te garbha ejatu sahāvaitu jarāyuṇā |
GV05brup___u:2640: tam indra nirjahi garbheṇa sāvarāṃ saheti || BrhUp_6,4.23 ||
GV05brup___u:2641: jāte 'gnim upasamādhāyāṅka ādhāya kaṃse pṛṣadājyaṃ saṃnīya pṛṣadājyasyopaghātaṃ juhoti --
GV05brup___u:2643: asyopasandyāṃ mā chaitsīt prajayā ca paśubhiś ca svāhā |
GV05brup___u:2644: mayi prāṇāṃs tvayi manasā juhomi svāhā |
GV05brup___u:2645: yat karmaṇātyarīricam yad vā nyūnam ihākaram |
GV05brup___u:2646: agniṣṭat sviṣṭakṛd vidvān sviṣṭaṃ suhutaṃ karotu naḥ svāheti || BrhUp_6,4.24 ||
GV05brup___u:2647: athāsya dakṣiṇaṃ karṇam abhinidhāya vāg vāg iti triḥ |
GV05brup___u:2648: atha dadhi madhu ghṛtaṃ saṃnīyānantarhitena jātarūpeṇa prāśayati |
GV05brup___u:2649: bhūs te dadhāmi bhuvas te dadhāmi svas te dadhāmi bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ sarvaṃ tvayi dadhāmīti || BrhUp_6,4.25 ||
GV05brup___u:2651: tad asyaitad guhyam eva nāma bhavati || BrhUp_6,4.26 ||
GV05brup___u:2652: athainaṃ mātre pradāya stanaṃ prayacchati -- yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ |
GV05brup___u:2653: yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tam iha dhātave kar iti || BrhUp_6,4.27 ||
GV05brup___u:2654: athāsya mātaram abhimantrayate -- ilāsi maitrāvaruṇī vīre vīram ajījanat |
GV05brup___u:2655: sā tvaṃ vīravatī bhava yāsmān vīravato 'karad iti |
GV05brup___u:2656: taṃ vā etam āhuḥ -- atipitā batābhūḥ |
GV05brup___u:2658: paramāṃ bata kāṣṭhāṃ prāpa śriyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena |
GV05brup___u:2659: ya evaṃvido brāhmaṇasya putro jāyata iti || BrhUp_6,4.28 ||
GV05brup___u:2714: ādityānīmāni śuklāni yajūṃṣi vājasaneyena yājñavalkyenākhyayante || BrhUp_6,5.3 ||
